snippet: The Gulf Coast casinos, vital to the region’s economy, began reopening as the last effects of Hurricane Issac were still blowing outside.
abstract: Gulf Coast casinos, vital to the region’s economy, began reopening even as the last effects of Hurricane Issac persisted; quick recovery is in stark contrast to the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina, when it took $550 million and an entire year for the casinos to reopen their doors.
lead_paragraph: The Gulf Coast casinos, vital to the region’s economy, began reopening as the last effects of Hurricane Issac were still blowing outside.

headline.seo: For Gulf Casinos, a Brief Lull in the Action
headline.main: Wind Still Kicking, Gulf Casinos Mobilize and Spin Back to Life
headline.print_headline: Wind Still Swirling, Gulf Casinos Shake Off and Roll Back to Life
